pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exact Samples Sizes and Inference for Clinical Trials with Binary Endpoint // Allows the user to determine minimum sample sizes that achieve target size and power at a specified alternative. For more information, see A comprehensive open-source library for exact required sample size in binary clinical trials by Lloyd, C.J. Ripamonti E. (2021) Contemporary Clinical Trials 107, doi:10.1016/j.cct.2021.106491.
